title: perdida de correos en bandeja de entrada
content: he tenido que reinicar mi cuenta de thunderbird por un problema interno de red. Al hacerlo todos los correos de varios años que se mantenian en bandeja de entrada por contener informacion importante no me aparecen mas luego del procedimiento. necesito ayuda para restablecer esos mails
creator: copskycop

title: Unable to Add New Account or Completely Remove Existing Data （無法新增帳戶及移除乾淨）
content:
1.Recently, while trying to modify my account settings, I found that the “Add Account” function in the upper-right corner gets stuck on the loading spinner after submitting the information. It never finishes or stops, and unlike the first time I set it up, there’s no option to manually add an account anymore. （近期因帳戶設定須修正，發現右上的「新增帳戶」功能在輸入完資料後送出，會一直卡在轉圈圈畫面，也無法終止，也不像第一次那樣有手動新增的選項。）

2.Even after uninstalling and reinstalling the program, all previous data still remained. Fortunately, after checking with ChatGPT, I learned that I had to manually clear the files under the “APPDATA” directory to completely remove them. （移除重裝後，原先資料仍然存在。好在詢問 ChatGPT 後才知道必須手動清除 APPDATA 資料夾下的內容，才能徹底移除。）

— Translated by ChatGPT
creator: wl94156

title: Email finiscono nello spam
content: Tutte le email interne che ci scambiamo sembrano finire nello spam. Abbiamo riscontrato che il problema sembra essere al momento solamente tra caselle con lo stesso dominio, riceviamo email esterne normalmente. Quale potrebbe essere la causa e come possiamo risolvere?
creator: uffcom.one

title: YAHOO MAIL retrieval by TB (asks PASSWORD & EDGE: too many requests
content:
Win 10 - TB 64 bit 128.9.2 long working ...... NEW error.

Pop up asks for PASSWORD ..... has not changed ..... does not work (loops)

Has 2-factor .... still worded fine

Pop up with URL says only EDGE: too many requests (moved from 5 to 3 ... no help)

Web access to that Yahoo Mail works ... same password.

I recall - I THINK - same thing with a different Yahoo Mail account .... access via web, then got a pop up about allowing THUNDERBIRD. Clicked it and no issue since. Not happened with this account. Tried switch to "Normal Password" .... no joy.
creator: mikephilexpat
